contract_description: This Procurement Contract is entered into between Sreedevi Constructions and Plasma Corporation.
objective: To provide products/services to the Buyer with volume discounts and pricing terms.
pricing_and_payment_terms: Product A: $10 per unit; Product B: $20 per unit; Product C: $30 per unit. Payment within 30 days from invoice receipt via bank transfer.
termination_clause: Either party may terminate with 30 days written notice or immediately for material breach.
